message.name: ERR_PERSON_FV_BIRTH_COUNTRY
message.locale: The birth country must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_FV_MARITAL_STATUS
message.locale: The marital status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: The details of aÂ client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_DOB_AFTER_RELATION_START
message.locale: Date of birth cannot be later than the start date of any active relationship.

message.name: ERR_FV_DOD_BEFORE_RELATION_START
message.locale: Date of death cannot be earlier than the start date of any active relationship.
